explains: v. 声称，主张；竞争，争夺；处理，对付
wordGroup: contend with 对付；与…作斗争

sentences.en: He well knew the futility of trying to contend against witches, so he gave up discouraged.
sentences.cn: 他深知与女巫斗争是徒劳无益的，所以他灰心丧气地放弃了。

sentences.en: Modern European states, they contend, appeared after the Renaissance through the rise of nations.
sentences.cn: 他们争辩道，现代欧洲国家是在文艺复兴之后通过国家的崛起而出现的。

sentences.en: It is time, once again, to contend with racism.
sentences.cn: 又是对付种族主义的时候了。
